title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 December 2011 - XWiki
content:
00:00 <Enygma`> has quit  
00:49 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
01:07 <jvdrean> has quit  
01:36 <vmassol> has quit

03:30 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki

07:03 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:18 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:19 <@cjdelisle> !search test  
07:19 <@cjdelisle> XWIKI-1234  
07:22 <@cjdelisle> hrm  
07:29 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:37 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:38 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:45 <DrLou> has quit  
07:47 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:48 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:51 <@cjdelisle> I'm trying to add a field to the botlet object to allow them to be disabled semi-perminently  
07:55 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
07:59 <@cjdelisle> one more cycle to verify what I think is happening  
07:59 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <CIA-114> cjdelisle master \* r975fc92 / (7 files): XWIKI-7312: Persist disabling of botlets between restarts of the irc bot. - http://git.io/cyve0w  
08:57 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>  
09:00 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <vmassol> cjdelisle: thanks for doing what I wanted to do with the irc bot! :) Seems you got annoyed by it before me :)  
09:06 <@cjdelisle> heh it restarted last night and I decided I was done shutting it off  
10:06 <mflorea> has quit  
10:18 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <lucaa> has quit  
11:27 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
11:31 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:31 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:59 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <gdelhumeau> Can we do "UPDATE" query with HQL/XWQL?  
12:06 <vmassol> yes  
12:10 <gdelhumeau> but I have to do executeUpdate() instead of execute(), that's right ?  
12:24 <@cjdelisle> IIRC yes  
12:38 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r088abb1 / (6 files in 4 dirs): Add more functional tests for the App Within Minutes. - http://git.io/U9yclA  
12:38 <CIA-114> Marius Dumitru Florea stable-3.3.x \* r52ccbca / (6 files in 4 dirs): Add more functional tests for the App Within Minutes. ...  
12:49 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
13:32 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <gdelhumeau> What's wrong with:  
13:57 <gdelhumeau> #set( $udpateQuery = "UPDATE StringProperty prop SET prop.value='Current Wiki' WHERE prop.name = 'visibility' AND prop.id = 55337290" )  
13:57 <gdelhumeau> $services.query.xwql($udpateQuery).execute()  
13:57 <gdelhumeau> ?  
13:57 <gdelhumeau> Answer: "Caused by: org.xwiki.query.jpql.parser.ParserException: [1,1] expecting: select"  
14:03 <+lucaa> it's pretty obvious  
14:03 <+lucaa> I mean I think  
14:04 <+lucaa> you cannot use update, you need to do select  
14:04 <+lucaa> I mean you can only do select  
14:04 <+lucaa> but why would you want to do an update like that  
14:04 <+lucaa> ?  
14:05 <+lucaa> you should \_never\_ change properties directly in the database, always through the objects / documents api  
14:10 <gdelhumeau> Ok  
14:11 <gdelhumeau> but, to be curious, if I need to use update query, I just can't ?  
15:26 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:27 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
15:36 <silviar> has quit  
15:50 <vmassol> cool got my first version of a maven packager plugin to generate distributions :) Will send a mail about it  
15:51 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: there's an error in "language" in http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/XWikiNotifications?viewer=changes&rev2=3.1  
15:52 <vmassol> also would be best if you could use the SCM macro {{scm}}, see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/SCM We're trying to remove direct github/svn links as we progress  
15:52 <vmassol> thanks! :)  
15:52 <gdelhumeau> ok  
15:52 <gdelhumeau> but I wanted to edit edited only the last section  
15:53 <gdelhumeau> I don't why it changed something before  
16:26 <gdelhumeau> I have just finished my first app, where can I show you?  
16:27 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: you could ask for a wiki on myxwiki.org  
16:27 <vmassol> do you need PR for it?  
16:27 <vmassol> (programming rights)  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> yes  
16:27 <vmassol> then you need your own wiki  
16:28 <vmassol> since giving PR rights to users on myxwiki.org is too dangerous  
16:30 <gdelhumeau> can I send you my .xar, only to have your opinion on what I've done/practices I used ?  
16:34 <vmassol> you can upload it anywhere you want and then post a mail on the list about it  
16:34 <vmassol> now if you're serious about your app  
16:34 <vmassol> you could publish in etxensions.xwiki.org  
16:34 <vmassol> depends what it's for  
16:34 <vmassol> you can also host it on your machine and make your machine accessible from the internet  
17:17 <sburjan> has quit  
17:23 <gdelhumeau> http://kephpage.net/xwiki/MacrosEditor.xar
